<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="SOW Overview Tier2 SNC">cdb246851b7f155062e50ed2cd4bcbf0</macroponent><name>UpdateGridListModeTier2</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    if (event.elementId != api.state.gridSelected)
        api.setState('gridSelected', event.elementId == "button_iconic_grid" ? true : false);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-12-14 13:54:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>d9b286851b7f155062e50ed2cd4bcb30</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UpdateGridListModeTier2</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Invoice Portal" source="d778dcbd1b6ec9d08c5143f3cc4bcbb2">d778dcbd1b6ec9d08c5143f3cc4bcbb2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Invoice Portal">d778dcbd1b6ec9d08c5143f3cc4bcbb2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_d9b286851b7f155062e50ed2cd4bcb30</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-12-14 14:21:13</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
